com.jgoodies.animation.animations
Class FanAnimation

java.lang.Object
  com.jgoodies.animation.AbstractAnimation
      com.jgoodies.animation.animations.FanAnimation
All Implemented Interfaces:
Animation
public final class FanAnimation
extends AbstractAnimation

An animation that rotates a fan that consists of a set of translucent sectors.

Version:
$Revision: 1.1 $
Author:
Karsten Lentzsch
See Also:
FanComponent, FanRenderer
